data.title: Hamburg Hbf → Groningen Europapark by Train
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Hamburg Hbf to Groningen Europapark in 3h 48m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Hamburg Hbf to Groningen Europapark today.
data.text:
If you want to travel from Hamburg Hbf to Groningen Europapark by train, you've come to the right place.

You can expect the journey from Hamburg Hbf to Groningen Europapark by train to take around 5 hours 15 minutes. If you want to get there as quickly as possible, it can take as little as 3 hours 48 minutes on the fastest services. You’ll usually find around 20 trains per day running on this route, which spans 143 miles (230 km). You’ll have to make 3 changes along the way on your journey to Groningen Europapark. Both ICE and DB trains operate on this route, offering modern comfortable services with plenty of room for luggage as standard.

You can save money on train tickets from Hamburg Hbf to Groningen Europapark if you book in Use our Journey Planner at the top of the page to search for cheap ticket prices – we'll show you how much you can save on train tickets from Hamburg Hbf to Groningen Europapark if you book in advance.. Use our Journey Planner at the top of the page to compare ticket prices and get the cheapest fares.
